content.html: If you are a Christian and your first thought is: - "My church isn't like that" - "They aren't real Christians" - "They don't speak for the rest of us Christians" You need to realize... ...they do. They are. (It is.) Your religion has been hijacked. Stand against them.
content.value:
If you are a Christian and your first thought is:

- "My church isn't like that"
- "They aren't real Christians"
- "They don't speak for the rest of us Christians"

You need to realize...

...they do. They are. (It is.)

Your religion has been hijacked. Stand against them.
